paper_title.ja: 低品質再生粗骨材を用いたコンクリートの乾燥収縮ひずみの予測式
paper_title.en: PREDICTION EQUATION OF DRYING SHRINKAGE STRAIN OF CONCRETE WITH LOW QUALITY RECYCLED COARSE AGGREGATE

description.ja: 本研究では、低品質再生粗骨材を用いたコンクリートの乾燥収縮ひずみに影響を及ぼす因子について検討を行い乾燥収縮ひずみの予測式の構築を試みた。吸水率の異なる6種類の低品質な再生粗骨材を用いて収縮ひずみ試験を行った結果、再生コンクリートの乾燥収縮ひずみは、粗骨材中に含まれる全水量を加えた見かけの単位水量（W´＝W＋W<sub>G</sub>）、再生粗骨材の付着モルタル量を除いた正味の粗骨材量（G´）、単位セメント量および単位CfFA量に影響されることを確認した。次いで、それらの影響因子を考慮して、収縮ひずみの最終値に対し重回帰分析を行い推定式を求めた。推定式を用いて予測した結果は測定データをある程度表すことができることが分かった。
description.en: The goal of this research is to establish the concrete mix design containing both low quality recycled coarse aggregate and CfFA（Carbon-free Fly Ash）. CfFA is high quality fly ash which has unburnt carbon of less than 1%, and the use of CfFA is very effective for the improvement of flowability of concrete and the prevention of alkali-silica reaction of recycled aggregate. In this paper, the fundamental data on drying shrinkage strain of recycled coarse aggregate concrete were discussed in detail. As a result, the factors influencing drying shrinkage strain of concrete were cement content, water content, coarse aggregate content and the dosage of CfFA. In particular, for recycled coarse aggregate concrete, the effects of high absorption of recycled coarse aggregate and the amount of mortar adhering to coarse aggregate should be concerned. Then, the effects of these factors on the values of the final drying shrinkage strain at the age of 6 months were discussed, by introducing the apparent water content defined as the sum of water content and the absorption of aggregate（W´＝W＋W<sub>G</sub>）and the apparent coarse aggregate content subtracted the adhered mortar content from coarse aggregate content（G´＝G－M）, instead of water content and coarse aggregate content in the mix proportion of concrete. In this paper, the multiple regression analysis was applied to calculate the final drying shrinkage strain as well as the prediction equation proposed by AIJ. It was found that the proposed equation for drying shrinkage strain of recycled coarse aggregate concrete can express the experimental data.

paper_title.ja: 焼成工程を備えた風力微粉砕処理システムによる石炭灰の改質

description.ja: 本研究では,石炭灰に含まれる未燃カーボンの除去と45μmふるい残分の粉砕分級処理を行い粒形を整えることができれば,従来の石炭灰にない特徴が付加され,土木・建築分野における有効利用率が大幅に増大するものと考えた。そこで,石炭灰中の未燃カーボンの除去と粒形を整えることのできる石炭灰の改質処理システムの開発を行い,試製した改質石炭灰を使用したコンクリートの諸特性について明らかにした。
